additionalInfo: Contributed significantly to reducing the team's outstanding bug ticket backlog by over 50%, decreasing the volume from over 200 tickets to less than 100 during the internship.
Resolved and contributed to the closure of over 50 bug tickets, demonstrating strong problem-solving and analytical skills
Collaborated effectively within the bug team to identify, analyze, and resolve software issues reported by users and developers.
Developed proficiency in front-end frameworks such as Angular and Vue, as well as back-end development with PHP.
